documents.document: @CharaWatson my pleasure. we all need it eh? X
There you go, a healthy dose of #goodmedicine As always i love to hear what keeps you going, quotes, films, poems, books. xx
We are cups, constantly and quietly being filled. (Ray Bradbury) #goodmedicine

Artists don't get down to work until the pain of working is exceeded by the pain of not working.
- Stephen DeStaebler -

Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
- Thomas Merton - #goodmedicine
it is only for those who are willing to undergo the effort needed to understand it.” Flannery O Connor (2/2)
Art never responds to the wish to make it democratic;it is not for everybody; (1/2)

Each day is a journey, and the journey itself home.
- Matsuo Basho - #goodmedicine
Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything. - George Bernard Shaw - #goodmedicine
'It is the weak who are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected of the strong.' Roskin #goodmedicine
'To create, one must first question everything.' Eileen Gray #goodmedicine

If the only prayer you said was thank you, that would be enough.
- Meister Eckhart #goodmedicine

I think in terms of the day's resolutions, not the year's.' - Henry Moore
#goodmedicine
The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled ”— Plutarch #goodmedicine

The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
W.B. Yeats – #goodmedicine
There is such a thing as the courage in remaining baffled.” Donald Antrim #goodmedicine
The things we want are transformative & we don’t know or only think we know what is on the other side of that transformation Rebecca Solnit
Unbeing dead isn't being alive. e. e. cummings #goodmedicine
Once we believe in ourselves,we can risk curiosity,wonder,spontaneous delight,or any experience that reveals the human spirit. e.e.cummings
“I'd woken up early, and I took a long time getting ready to exist.” ― Fernando Pessoa #goodmedicine
Poetry is the language of intensity. Because we are going to die, an expression of intensity is justified.⁰⁰C.D. Wright #goodmedicine
The challenge to each human is creation. Will you create with reverence or with neglect? Gary Zukav #goodmedicine
Art doesn't transform. It just plain forms" Roy Lichtenstein #goodmedicine
Day draws near. Another one Do what you can ---Milosz #goodmedicine
"Art is a form of nourishment (of consciousness, the spirit)" Susan Sontag #goodmedicine
The artist appeals…to that in us which is a gift and not an acquisition –and, therefore, more permanently enduring. J Conrad #goodmedicine
Art is our chief means of breaking bread with the dead. - W.H. Auden #goodmedicine
The arts are not a way to make a living. They are a very human way of making life more bearable. Vonnegut #goodmedicine
“Art is why I get up in the morning” @anidifranco #goodmedicine
You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation. ~ Plato #goodmedicine
I doubt that the imagination can be suppressed. If you truly eradicated it in a child, he would grow up to be an eggplant U K. Le Guin
Apparently there is nothing that cannot happen today. Mark Twain #goodmedicine (could this be more relevant?)
To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong. Joseph Chilton Pearce #goodmedicine
Imagination is the beginning of creation. You imagine what you desire, you will what you imagine & at last you create what you will GB Shaw

Curiosity about life in all of its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.
- Leo Burnett #goodmedicine
A poem does invite, it does require.What does it invite?A poem invites you to feel.More than that:it invites you to respond Muriel Rukeyser

#goodmedicine Within you there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself.
- Hermann Hesse
in celebration of @MatthewLintott 's show tonight & the importance of art in the face of darkness (for me) I'm posting some #goodmedicine
Submit a Comment to Stop the Dakota Access Pipeline https://t.co/hwgs3gkKtl
@flaxonptootch @MatthewLintott yeah!! We will miss you there xx
Hi @kentishtowner If you're free tmrw 7pm come along to local @MatthewLintott 's show @flaxonptootch feat. Cocktails by somewhereovernowhere
Done! Ready for tmrw :) @flaxonptootch 7pm Feb 2nd @MatthewLintott https://t.co/7CLbg7Z6og
setting up @flaxonptootch for tmrw's show @MatthewLintott @Magatronic https://t.co/qm2CjKwBaA
"Well behaved women seldom make history" Laurel T Ulrich Happy St Brigit's Day to all the wild women and wild men out there x
@MatthewLintott look at this: @artlicks
https://t.co/IGOhCHwvcv Some #goodmedicine today to give you a lift...
I love being part of this project. Fair play Drive!!! https://t.co/SUeTc00q0b
@MaxineWaters @funder Thank you Ms Waters for this important step.
It's nearly here! the show @MatthewLintott @flaxonptootch Feb 2 Can't wait. There will be much celebrating& clinking of glasses @Magatronic
@MatthewLintott thought you would like this... https://t.co/JlwWSPtfvu
@NASA thank you for all that you do. You inspire me and many others. Please keep going
@vivienwhiskey stay sharp Viv. Stay strong. and keep talking. stops the poison settling in your soul. xxx
@ericagillingham have you heard of these good women? https://t.co/kZj1qVmRTi
Thanks @shorterSi Timely reminder on this. We need more #storytellers !!! https://t.co/01eZ8niX7X
@MatthewLintott look at this... https://t.co/KruPEj2r1O
https://t.co/MXus2I7S1X wondering if this has made it onto @Upworthy A good story for dark times.
@OwenJones84 thank you for all you do, and for dealing with so many morons. Please keep going.
What she said!!! What a comedown. Post week blues. X https://t.co/6SQ6aEglqJ
What a crew! Love that Billie has his shades on...."the future is so bright..." @katebeales13 @alnedjari https://t.co/BMytzl1O0w
https://t.co/1wd5hgViEM love my country. So proud! @billmckibben @350
Great pic. Epic week. Reunion again soon. The storytellers keep getting better. https://t.co/Onzb8obVy8
@harris79 @shorterSi @katebeales13 @Blesma @thedriveproj wicked week.
@350 @BadlandsNPS who forced them? Obvious question perhaps but have to keep asking the obvious.
@FloOMahony ha! I wouldn't expect you to! I forget names and faces all the time, it's par for the course in our line of work. x
@FloOMahony after meeting you at D & D I have total faith you will nail it :)
@FloOMahony you can always email me if that will help. But yes, less is more is the basic premise, and they can come to you with questions
@FloOMahony i get you. Hmm, hard to explain in a tweet. but less is more. can you boil the kernel down to three focused sentences?
@FloOMahony do you mean in conversation or on paper?
@MatthewLintott another bloody good reason to get our socks on and get to Bristol ;) https://t.co/ekuDoboizj
@harris79 @JerwoodSpace @katebeales13 woo hooo. What a posse!!
Working with @thedriveproj and @Blesma this week w @alnedjari and @katebeales13 Loving it, inspiring work all round
See you thurs @shorterSi ? https://t.co/2xT0vPomwW
Thanks Viv. How to stay awake amid this madness is part of the big work. Stay awake and keep fighting https://t.co/xpKzuEg1ZE
@theatre_direct @vivienwhiskey that is so fantastic. Thank you
Yep. Let's get to work. What a fab crew!! https://t.co/RCebZ9v5fx
@ericagillingham protesting with these fab women #WomensMarch https://t.co/wwk0qFLcHk
#WomensMarch https://t.co/n4ckKRJcIH
A lot of people gathering in sunny London for #WomensMarch Some fab signs https://t.co/lUcbvGKaI8
Joining all the good and great humans in London as we march in solidarity with Washington #womensmarch
I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness for it shows me the stars. Og Mandino #goodmedicine
I don't believe in charity. I believe in solidarity...It respects the other person.I have a lot to learn from other people Eduardo Galeano
The purpose of torture is not getting information. It's spreading fear. Eduardo Galeano
Men explain things to me, still. And no man has ever apologized for explaining, wrongly, things that I know and they don't.” Rebecca Solnit
The walls are the publishers of the poor.” ― Eduardo Galeano #goodmedicine
We are all mortal until the first kiss and the second glass of wine.” ― Eduardo Galeano #goodmedicine
Remember, You're braver than you believe, Stronger than you seem, Smarter than you think. A.A. Milne
The soul, of the soul, of the Universe, is Love. Rumi #goodmedicine
Words are events, they do things, change things They transform both speaker and hearer; they feed energy back&forth & amplify it U K Le Guin
Don’t give up. Normally it is the last key on the ring which opens the Door. Paulo Coelho #goodmedicine
I have been bent and broken, but - I hope - into a better shape. Charles Dickens #goodmedicine
Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none. William Shakespeare
A star will not shine until it has assembled enough self; once it has enough self it cannot help but shine... Amy Leach #goodmedicine
..it is only in being creative that the individual discovers the self.” D W Winnicott #goodmedicine
Where you stumble, there your treasure lies. Joseph Campbell
“There is no point in using the word 'impossible' to describe something that has clearly happened.” Douglas Adams #goodmedicine
I have come to the conclusion that politics is too serious a matter to be left to the politicians. ~Charles de Gaulle~
@OwenJones84 didn't we have this redundant debate, oh I don't know, 20 years ago? Very grim. thanks for pointing it out.
A politician is a fellow who will lay down your life for his country. ~ Tex Guinan~
We hang the petty thieves and appoint the great ones to public office ~Aesop~ #goodmedicine
By assaulting nature,we raise the odds that we will assault each other.By bringing nature into our lives,we invite humility. Richard Louv
